divs: sighting detailsit was sunday night approximately 11:00 i went outside the backyard to let my dogs in and i noticed towards the southwestern sky very bright objects one large and one small the smallest one disappeared quickly it was kind of yellowish the large one is very bright orange color diamond shaped no sound it was drifting towards the southwest and then west towards the city of rosenberg texas i also noticed before it turn west a dole gray object descended to the ground it floated like leaf the weather outside stafford texas was very foggy night this is the first time i've ever witnessed a thing so unusual thank you sincerely luis aguilar 2\11\13 1 am
Summary: two UFOs very bright one large one small or large one looked like a diamond the smaller one yellowishand disappeared quickly no sound
